results.deck: An action RPG for PC, 360 and PS3. Developed by Obsidian Entertainment and published by Square Enix, it introduces a number of changes to the Dungeon Siege series.
results.name: Dungeon Siege III

results.deck: After approximately fourteen years of development, the heavily infamous sequel to Duke Nukem 3D was finally released, in which the macho Duke must damper yet another alien invasion.
results.name: Duke Nukem Forever

results.deck: This WWII-themed flight simulator features six major European air battles from the perspective of allied fighter-aces. As the first console game in a series known for its historically accurate, realistic simulations, Birds of Prey provides a more accessible experience by offering three levels of difficulty and realism.
results.name: Il-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey

results.deck: WWE Legends of Wrestlemania is a wrestling game that features superstars from the past clashing in WrestleMania-themed events. It was developed by  Yuke's, the developer which made the SmackDown! series.
results.name: WWE Legends of WrestleMania

results.deck: Quantum of Solace is a first-person/third-person shooter based on the James Bond films Casino Royale and its sequel, Quantum of Solace.
results.name: Quantum of Solace

results.deck: GRID is a franchise "reboot" of the TOCA Race Driver series, originally called Race Driver One.  GRID uses an engine modified upon DiRT's Neon engine; called the EGO engine.  It takes a more arcade-style approach to the series along with plenty other new features/changes.
results.name: GRID

results.deck: Dragon Age: Origins is an epic fantasy role-playing game featuring a rich story, personality-driven characters, and tactical, bloody combat. It is considered a spiritual successor to the Baldur's Gate series.
results.name: Dragon Age: Origins

results.deck: Tom Clancy's Endwar is a real time strategy game in which the three major superpowers of the world ignite and engage in World War III.
results.name: Tom Clancy's EndWar

results.deck: Need for Speed: Undercover returns the franchise to the arcade-style open world gameplay found in NFS: Most Wanted and NFS: Carbon.
results.name: Need for Speed: Undercover

results.deck: Rico Rodriguez returns to explore another autocratic island nation in this explosion-laded followup to Just Cause.
results.name: Just Cause 2

results.deck: UFC 2009 Undisputed is a mixed martial arts fighting game developed by Yuke's Osaka, developers of the WWE SmackDown! games. It is the first UFC game to be released under the licensing agreement signed with THQ.
results.name: UFC 2009 Undisputed

results.deck: Spider-Man: Web Of Shadows sees Spider-Man facing off against nemesis Venom and his army of Symbiotes with the help of both Marvel heroes and villains.
results.name: Spider-Man: Web of Shadows

results.deck: Treyarch takes the famous series back sixty years, with the first Call of Duty game set in the Pacific Theatre, against the Imperial Japanese in World War II.
results.name: Call of Duty: World at War

results.deck: NFL Tour is the newest evolution and successor of EA Sports Big's arcade football NFL Street franchise. Developed by EA Tiburon with a less orthodox approach to the sport, NFL Tour strived to create a more accessible football experience.
results.name: NFL Tour

results.deck: FIFA Street 3 continues EA's stylized arcade soccer series. Combine moves seamlessly to rack up style points and land game-winning goals against opponents.
results.name: FIFA Street 3
Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol Encore

results.deck: Based on the Pixar animated film taking place seven hundred years into the future, Wall-e is about the last functioning robot on Earth in this adventure platformer.
results.name: Wall-E

results.deck: In the far future, utilizing power-ups, shortcuts, and various anti-gravity vehicles players compete on tracks spread throughout the planets to become the Best Racer in the Solar System.
results.name: Voltage

results.deck: UEFA Euro 2008 is the official video game of the UEFA Euro 2008 football championships. Developed by EA Canada, the game uses an improved version of the FIFA 08 engine.
results.name: UEFA Euro 2008

results.deck: Engineer Isaac Clarke battles a polymorphic virus-like alien infestation which turns human corpses into grotesque undead alien monsters called "Necromorphs", while trying to survive on board an infested interstellar mining ship named the USG Ishimura.
results.name: Dead Space

results.deck: Diablo III returns to the world of Sanctuary twenty years after the events of Diablo II with a new generation of heroes that must defeat the demonic threat from Hell.
results.name: Diablo III

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 6 is the latest in a long line of Dynasty Warriors game. The missions are adapted from the 14th century novel Romance of The Three Kingdoms written by Luo Guanzhong.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 6

results.deck: NBA Live 09 is the next installment in the popular basketball franchise from Electronic Arts.
results.name: NBA Live 09

results.deck: The third game in the Destroy All Humans! series, Path Of Furon depicts Cryptosporidium 139 in his attempt to save the Furons from an evil alien species.
results.name: Destroy All Humans! Path of the Furon

results.deck: Tiberium was the second attempt at a first person shooter set in the Command & Conquer universe. Publisher EA Games canceled the project in September 2008, citing quality concerns.
results.name: Tiberium

results.deck: LEGO Batman: The Video Game is an action adventure platformer focused on the combination of the popular Batman universe and the continued licensing of Lego-styled video games.
results.name: LEGO Batman: The Videogame

results.deck: Aquatopia is a downloadable virtual aquarium for use with the PlayStation Eye.  It is listed on the PlayStation Store as "Interactive Art".
results.name: Aquatopia

results.deck: Ten years after the events of the first game, Subject Delta is awoken and must unravel the mystery behind the Big Sisters and his own past in the ruined underwater city of Rapture.
results.name: BioShock 2

results.deck: EA's 2009 entry in the Tiger Woods PGA Tour franchise.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 09

results.deck: The 6th installment in Ubisoft's World War II Brothers in Arms series was released on the anniversary of Market Garden, September 23, 2008 for Xbox 360, PS3 and PC.
results.name: Brothers in Arms: Hell's Highway

results.deck: 2008's iteration of Sony's first-party exclusive baseball franchise brings the well-regarded gameplay into next-gen with new detailed textures, lifelike player faces, online leagues, weekly roster updates and more on Playstation 3, as well as scaled-back PSP and Playstation 2 versions.
results.name: MLB 08: The Show

results.deck: Tales of Vesperia is a Japanese Role-Playing Game and the first entry in the long-running "Tales of" franchise on seventh-generation consoles.
results.name: Tales of Vesperia

results.deck: NFL Head Coach is a football simulation game based loosely on Madden 09s' franchise mode but is much more in-depth in terms of what you can do.  It is a follow-up to NFL Head Coach
results.name: NFL Head Coach 09

results.deck: 12th NCAA Football game in the NCAA football series and the 1st to have online dynasty mode and the new breakaway engine.
results.name: NCAA Football 09

results.deck: Hei$t would have starred Johnny, leader of a group of renegade criminals who all share the same ultimate goal of robbing the U.S. Mint by pulling off progressively bigger bank jobs in order to acquire the equipment and experience necessary for such a task. It was cancelled before release.
results.name: Hei$t

results.deck: Top Spin 3 is a tennis game that is regarded as one of the most realistic simulations of the sport to date. It places huge emphasis on timing and positioning.
results.name: Top Spin 3

results.deck: EA Sports races in with another year of NASCAR Racing with NASCAR 09.
results.name: NASCAR 09

results.deck: Major League Baseball is back with 2K Sports MLB 2K8, featuring new pitching controls and swing stick 2.0.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K8

results.deck: The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian is adapted from the novel-adapted movie of the same name.
results.name: Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian

results.deck: Race in realistic environments with ATVs or Monster Trucks.
results.name: MX vs. ATV Untamed

results.deck: The Incredible Hulk is a free roam, open world game, allowing the player to reek havoc on the streets of New York City while playing through the story of the movie.
results.name: The Incredible Hulk

results.deck: Siren: Blood Curse is the PlayStation 3 installment in Sony's horror franchise, available for download in episodic packs on PlayStation Network.
results.name: Siren: Blood Curse

results.deck: Cancelled in March 2011, The Agency was a spy-themed action MMORPG being developed by SOE.
results.name: The Agency

results.deck: Sacred 2: Fallen Angel is a prequel to Sacred, taking place 2,000 years before the events in the first game. It has a new graphics engine, which is able to render in 3D but keeps the original game's isometric perspective.
results.name: Sacred 2: Fallen Angel

results.deck: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm is an exclusive Playstation 3 game based on the acclaimed anime series.
results.name: Naruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm

results.deck: Damnation is a steampunk themed shooter that features vertical gameplay as one of its core elements.
results.name: Damnation

results.deck: Third and final installment of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. Spyro and Cynder team up to stop the Dark Master, Malefor, from destroying the world.
results.name: The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon

results.deck: A World War I first-person shooter that aimed to emphasize the horrors of trench warfare. It was planned for release in 2008 but soon became vaporware, and the studio working on it was closed in 2009.
results.name: To End All Wars

results.deck: NBA 2K9 continues the 2K Sports line of NBA basketball games with its tenth installment.
results.name: NBA 2K9

results.deck: Blitz: The League II brings back the classic football game to a new audience with brutal hits, injuries, HD visuals, and a gritty story mode.
results.name: Blitz: The League II

results.deck: A first-person shooter set in the Alien universe. The player is part of a search-and-rescue team sent out to search for the missing USCM team last seen in Aliens.
results.name: Aliens: Colonial Marines

results.deck: Based on the animated series and manga of the same name, Afro Samurai is a character action game that pits Afro (voiced by Samuel L. Jackson) against a horde of enemies. Published and developed by Namco Bandai Games Inc. with the help of Surge.
results.name: Afro Samurai

results.deck: Order Up is a cooking simulation video game where you not only use the Wii mote to hone your vitrual cooking skills, but also manage and run multiple restaurants.
results.name: Order Up!

results.deck: Sequel to Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2. Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2009 promises to be more survival orientated that the previous two.
results.name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2009

results.deck: Buzz! Quiz TV marks the debut of Sony's party-quiz series, Buzz!, to the PlayStation 3; adding the ability for players to compete online as well as write their own questions and exchange quiz packs online.
results.name: Buzz! Quiz TV

results.deck: Make a reputation for yourself by tearing through the streets of an authentically recreated version of LA in Midnight Club: Los Angeles.
results.name: Midnight Club: Los Angeles

results.deck: Scantily dressed heroine Tyris Flare returns in the next-generation installment of the beloved side-scrolling brawler franchise.
results.name: Golden Axe: Beast Rider

results.deck: Facebreaker is a boxing game from the EA sports Brand of Electronic Arts. It has a more fun and accessible look over EA's other boxing franchise "Fight Night".
results.name: FaceBreaker

results.deck: For the first time, THQ and 2XL Games bring you the agressive, down and dirty racing in Baja: Edge of Control to your living room.
results.name: Baja: Edge of Control

results.deck: NHL 2K9 is purported to be a refresh of the series, designed to be easy to pick-up-and-play with simplified controls; as was the first NHL licensed title on the Nintendo Wii.
results.name: NHL 2K9

results.deck: SBK-08: Superbike World Championship is the official game for the '08 Superbike World Championship season.
results.name: SBK: Superbike World Championship

results.deck: Ferrari Challenge lets you drive just about any car you want......as long as its a Ferrari. This time, the licensed Ferrari racing game adds weather effects, a livery editor, new tracks, and a new focus on the Challenge series of cars, mainly the F430.
results.name: Ferrari Challenge Trofeo Pirelli

results.deck: Players take the role of Maritsu Evil Academy honor-student Mao in his quest to overthrow his father and take the title of Overlord of the Netherworld.
results.name: Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice

results.deck: Monster Madness: Grave Danger for the PS3 builds off of the base created by the original Monster Madness: Battle For Suburbia released in 2007 on the Xbox 360. Once again controling four teenage characters, players set out to save their town from the evil thats been unleashed.
results.name: Monster Madness: Grave Danger

results.deck: Sonic Unleashed is two different Sonic titles released in 2008 across four consoles. Both titles feature high-speed Sonic stages, slower-paced "Werehog" levels, and town hubs where players must progress through the story.
results.name: Sonic Unleashed

results.deck: Take to the slopes in this new snowboarding franchise from Ubisoft. Create your own paths, film your own tricks and share them with the world.
results.name: Shaun White Snowboarding

results.deck: Pure is an offroad racing game from the creators of the ATV Offroad Fury and MotoGP series. The game puts an emphasis on performing tricks and customizing ATVs with special parts.
results.name: Pure

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer has been the mainstay of many a hardcore gamers with it's focus of game play and customization, particular popular in Asia and Western Europe where it has built a fanatical base of devoted editors and players alike.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2009

results.deck: A 2008 entry into the Prince of Persia franchise titled simply "Prince of Persia", this game stars an all-new Prince as he teams up with the mysterious Elika to fight Ahriman and cleanse the world of his corruption.
results.name: Prince of Persia

results.deck: Be immersed in Middle Earth where you fight to stop the forces of evil from taking over Middle Earth or prevent the good of Middle Earth from achieving victory in this " Star Wars Battlefront" version of Lord of the Rings.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest

results.deck: Larry Lovage returns for his first dismal failure on seventh-generation consoles in Box Office Bust, where Larry must find the mole working in his uncle's movie studio.
results.name: Leisure Suit Larry: Box Office Bust

results.deck: Heroes Over Europe is the follow-up to 2005's successful World War II flight sim Heores of the Pacific. The focus this time around is on enhanced multiplayer and a realistic plane damage system.
results.name: Heroes Over Europe

results.deck: A turn-based tactics game with real-time elements, that tells the story of Squad 7 as they rally together to fight for the freedom of their country, Gallia.
results.name: Valkyria Chronicles

results.deck: The History Channel: Battle for the Pacific is a first person shooter set in the Pacific Theater.
results.name: The History Channel: Battle for the Pacific

results.deck: A canceled pirate-themed action adventure game from Akella and 1C.
results.name: Age of Pirates: Captain Blood

results.deck: Control rogue agent Michael Thorton as he tries to unearth an international conspiracy in the near future (where everybody seems to have a hidden agenda or two) in this third-person action RPG.
results.name: Alpha Protocol

results.deck: Backbreaker is the debut game from NaturalMotion, developers of the Dynamic Motion Synthesis technology found in Euphoria. The title features on-the-fly simulation of tackles, rather than using animations produced by key-framing or motion capture.
results.name: Backbreaker

results.deck: Both a remake and expansion to the critically-acclaimed Xbox and PC title The Chronicles of Riddick: Escape from Butcher Bay, Dark Athena features both the original campaign, an all-new campaign and new multiplayer modes.
results.name: The Chronicles of Riddick: Assault on Dark Athena

results.deck: Developed by Vigil Games, Darksiders puts players in control of War, one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, as he attempts to find out who caused a premature Apocalypse while battling both Angels and Demons on a dead Earth.
results.name: Darksiders

results.deck: Thirteen of the greatest (and not so greatest) pinball machines from famed pinball table manufacturer, Williams.
results.name: Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection

results.deck: EA Sports returns with the '09 edition of FIFA, a soccer simulation video game series. FIFA 09 features gameplay and graphic improvements from its predecessor, FIFA 08, as well as increased amount of players, leagues, and stadiums, and you have more control overall in the game.
results.name: FIFA Soccer 09

results.deck: Disney Sing It is a new video-based karaoke game featuring the hottest new Disney talents.
results.name: Disney Sing It

results.deck: A cooking game based on the hit reality TV show Gordon Ramsay's Hells KItchen, the main man is now here to take out his aggressions on us when we mess it all up in the kitchen!
results.name: Hell's Kitchen

results.deck: Game based on the Disney movie by the same name.
results.name: Disney's Bolt

results.deck: Star Ocean: The Last Hope is the fourth installment in the Square Enix/Tri-Ace RPG series to be released outside of Japan, and is the fifth game in the series.
results.name: Star Ocean: The Last Hope

results.deck: On a post-apocalyptic Earth a catastrophic event forces humans to evolve creating two distinct races, the Echelon and the Sai. With coexistence no longer an option the stage is set for the final conflict.
results.name: Stormrise

results.deck: An MMO for the PC and PlayStation 3 that allows you to fight for and alongside the forces of good or evil from the DC Comics Universe.
results.name: DC Universe Online

results.deck: Ratchet and Clank Future:  Quest for Booty is a stand-alone PSN  title  that continues the adventures of Ratchet on his quest to discover the answers surrounding Clank's mysterious disappearance.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank Future: Quest for Booty

results.deck: MAG, a.k.a "Massive Action Game" was a PS3 exclusive, online-only FPS game developed by SOCOM creators Zipper Interactive. The game's most notable feature was its 256-player Domination mode.
results.name: MAG

results.deck: B.J.  Blazkowicz returns, guns blazing, to stop the Nazis from harnessing the power of an alternate dimension known as the Black Sun.
results.name: Wolfenstein

results.deck: Flower is a highly acclaimed, unique PSN exclusive that allows you to control the wind and collect flower petals while exploring a lush, colorful environment. Its innovative gameplay often seeks to create a soothing and relaxing experience through a combination of visuals and audio to complement the narrative.
results.name: Flower

results.deck: After the death of his brother at the hands of a corrupt Earth government, Alec Mason has no choice but to join the Red Faction terrorist cell and fight to free Mars from Earth oppression.
results.name: Red Faction: Guerrilla

results.deck: Singularity is Raven Software's alternate history shooter, where the player is given the ability of time manipulation.
results.name: Singularity

results.deck: Play as Postal Dude Jr. for the second time, and continue to cause general mayhem in a new setting, the town of Catharsis, Arizona.
results.name: Postal III

results.deck: This is the third PixelJunk game on PSN -- a unique take on the platforming genre. It features swing physics, trophy support, and YouTube video recording/uploading.
results.name: PixelJunk Eden

results.deck: The controversial Fat Princess sees the endless battle of red vs. blue comes to a fight between two kingdoms who have kidnapped each other's princess and are stuffing her with cake to make her rescue more difficult.
results.name: Fat Princess

results.deck: Conan is an action adventure game that has you slicing and dicing your way through hordes of enemies.
results.name: Conan

results.deck: In a futuristic totalitarian dystopia, a master courier (in a group of renegade "runners") investigates a conspiracy, while outrunning the deadly government military, in this parkour-inspired first-person action game.
results.name: Mirror's Edge

results.deck: TimeSplitters 4 is the latest installment in the TimeSplitters franchise by Crytek UK, formerly Free Radical Design. The project is currently on hold indefinitely.
results.name: TimeSplitters 4

results.deck: Go on Safari with your Sixaxis controlled camera at the ready in Natsume's photo-focused PlayStation 3 game.
results.name: Afrika
